Total:  5 min     Prep:  5 min     Yield: 4 servings      Nutrition Info                        Save Recipe              Pinterest                            Email                                           Total:  5 min     Prep:  5 min     Yield: 4 servings      Nutrition Info                Ingredients          Deselect All       4 cups frozen broccoli florets, thawed       12 cherry tomatoes, cut in 1/2       1/4 cup sliced red onion       1/2 cup fresh pearl-size mozzarella       1/2 cup red wine vinaigrette       Freshly ground pepper                   Add to Shopping List                      View Shopping List             Ingredient Substitutions                Directions                      In a large bowl, toss together all ingredients, except black pepper.                             Divide among 4 chilled salad plates. Serve with fresh ground pepper.
